name: Poisoned Tides
text:
Poisoned Tides’s power and toughness are each equal to the number of flooded lands on the battlefield plus the number of Tides you control.

Flood {2}{g}{g}(During your turn, you may pay {2}{g}{g} and exile this card from your hand flooding target land. It loses all land types and abilities, and it gains “{T}: Add {1}.”) 

Whenever you flood Poisoned Tides, you may search your library for a card named Pestilent Tides, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
